name: Rock Band Metal Track Pack
description:
Rock Band Metal Track Pack is a standalone title that allows owners of Rock Band and Rock Band 2 to keep the party rockin’ hard all night long with 21 seminal hits from the heyday of heavy metal and beyond, hand-picked with care by Harmonix. This Track Pack is also compatible with most Guitar Hero and other licensed instrument controllers and microphones.

Features

• Keep On Rockin’! A fully functional game with all the great features of Rock Band, including: Solo and Band Tour Mode, Quickplay, Tug of War, Score Duel, and song unlock progression.
• The Best Around! Bust out the leather with 21 of the most head-banging metal tracks in Rock Band history distilled to perfection on one disc, all utilizing the original master recordings.
